title: Received Icon, but no Skin
body:
A while ago I received the 10-year anniversary summoner's icon, and I already own Kayle and the Riot Kayle skin, but when I recieved the icon, I never received the mystery skin.

Was I not supposed to receive the Icon and Skin simultaneously?

replies.body: Each gift is being sent out individually, so you may not get everything all at once.  We will be posting updates through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as there are many eligible accounts that will take time to distribute out to.  Hang tight!
